comments.content:
It must be **[Fenway Park JF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014080820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/fenway-park-jf/)** by Jason Walcott (JAW Fonts, 2001)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014080820/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Nailed it!

Thanks so much, fvilanakis!
